column.name: entry_ids
column.label: Entry IDs
column.suffix: Entry ids to link to. One per line. Can follow search. wiki entries syntax

column.name: localfilepath
column.help: The server side directory to scan
column.label: Server file path

column.name: timedelay
column.label: Age
column.help: Find files that haven't changed in this time (minutes)

column.name: includepattern
column.label: Match files with patterns
column.suffix:
wildcard or "regexp:pattern". One per line. e.g.
*.nc
regexp:model[0-9]\.grb$
To match directories add a "dir" prefix:
dir:*data

column.name: directory_type
column.label: Directory Type
column.help: Entry type to use for directories
column.suffix: Note: If you change this then you should also clear the cache with the Admin->Maintenance->Clear Cache

column.name: date_offset
column.label: Date Offset
column.help: Offset the date by the number of seconds

column.name: date_patterns
column.label: Date Patterns
column.help: Extract the date from the file name

column.name: naming
column.label: Naming
column.suffix:
pattern:replacement e.g.
NAM:North American Model
path:GFS:Global Forecast Model

column.name: pattern
column.suffix: Only show files that match this pattern
column.label: File Pattern
